description: Apply an action in a Letsencrypt certificate by first domain.

vip.description: IP of the system, where a temporal Farm “Letsencryptz” is configured. Required true if param vip is not sent.

farmname.description: Farm name which a temporal Service “Letsencryptz” is configured in. Required if param vip is not sent.

restart.description: true, all the farms using the certificate will be restarted. false, no farms using the certificate will be restarted.
